Web development

Your local expert:

Bio:

Tina is a self-taught web developer, entrepreneur and Co-founder of The Institute Of Code based in Bali.

Follow Tina and @instituteofcode on instagram.

Sign up now and receive 20% off this learning experience!

SIGN UP

Course Details:

Location: Bali, Indonesia

Duration: 3 days

Level: Beginner

Price: $350 USD

What you'll learn:

Learn how to code and and create your own website, blog or online shop while exploring Bali with locals.

Where we'll be:

Canggu, Bali

What I'll provide:

I will teach you the basics of how to set up a website and how to write basic html and css to create a simple and beautiful website. This course is enough to get you started on your own if you wish to learn more about coding and web development.

Good to know

It's always good to have an idea of what you want to create in terms of design and colors, hand-sketches are a great way to get started so we have an idea of what you want to create.

Where we'll meet:

Canggu, Bali
